item.title: New Container: Spotube
item.description: We have released a new desktop application container for: Spotube Spotube is an open source, cross-platform Spotify client compatible across multiple platforms utilizing Spotify’s data API and YouTube, Piped.video or JioSaavn as an audio source, eliminating the need for Spotify Premium.
item.content:
We have released a new desktop application container for: Spotube

Spotube is an open source, cross-platform Spotify client compatible across multiple platforms utilizing Spotify’s data API and YouTube, Piped.video or JioSaavn as an audio source, eliminating the need for Spotify Premium.
